title: Perky Pet | Hummingbird Migration Map
tech: JS, Node, Google Maps, Cloud Functions, Firebase, HTML, CSS
description: This web app allows users to submit humingbird sightings, which get displayed on a map. The app uses Google Cloud resources such as Cloud Functions (written in Node) and a Firestore database to maintain records. It also allows user submitted images stored in Cloud Firestore. Images go through an approval process built in Microsoft Power Automate, which exchanges API calls with Google Cloud.

title: VLINK | Product Configurator
description: Web application that assists user in building and pricing a pest control system. Uses API calls to Magento to check pricing and stock, as well as enforce some business rules. User can add configured system to their cart.

title: Victor | Solution Finder
description: This collection of pages allows users to find the best pest control option based on the pest problem they have. The pages use JavaScript for multiple UI elements/widgets.

title: Perky-Pet | Flexports
description: Product landing page, responsive design, product slider, customized embedded, responsive video.

title: Safer Brand | Repellents
description: Product category landing page. Responsive HTML.

title: Victor | Smart-Kill Traps
description: Product landing page, responsive HTML, JavaScript UI elements.<

title: Victor | Learning Center
description: Collection of pages about rodent pests and products. Responsive HTML, JavaScript UI elements.

title: VLINK | Pricing
description: Pricing for product bundles. Uses Magento API calls for current product pricing, and response HTML, JavaScript UI elements.<
